Pilot sucks this place is outdated just by displaying pilot doesn’t make difference had to wait long for shower

They would not let me pay for a shower because I don't have a cdl I even explained I drove 30 minutes out of the way to get there while working in the area for a month. They should be letting all the homeless out front get free showers

This place really hooked me up. I was also able to take a shower and they let my dog in the bathroom with me So she would not be hot out in my van. The lady share we're all great not to mention very beautiful, It must be a pretty requisite …

This was our first time coming here and we were not disappointed. After a long day of driving, we were looking for a place to park, fuel, shower and eat…they provided all 4. It’s a smaller parking lot with a few free and a couple reserved …
Place is definitely not convenient only cdl drivers allowed to shower but when you come put here to help restore their power . DEFINITELY DONT STOP RUDE STAFF AND THE WEBSITE LIES

Drove 40 minutes out of my way to take a shower only to be told only truckers with reward cards can use them. Would have literally paid $30 to take a shower but they gave no option. Also, the bathroom was disgusting so maybe I dodged a …

What a joke for a truckstop!  No showers after 10 pm until 7 am.  We came in at 8 and they because of the line, we couldn't get a shower.  Nice way to treat the drivers who come to a Pilot expecting decent service.  Never again!

showerReviews.reviewText: It's sad to see the slow deterioration of the care for the facility as I've been a member since it opened as the Crosby Wellness Center. Shower handles remain broken, shower drains remain clogged, towels and soap are ofter empty. TV's don't …

I visited six different YMCA locations in three states, and this location has the best locker room and shower booths. It is very clean and seems to have been renovated recently. I like that each shower booth has a door and space to change …

… weight room and good assortment of machines to use! Excellent shower facility very clean up to date filtering for the water fill up of larger bottles in the restroom area and change the room that is top notch finally somebody's thinking!

Come in to swim and shower afterwards just for the pool to be closed. Go ahead to just grab a shower since we're about to be going out to eat and are an hour away from home and dirty from being outside beforehand. Staff didn't mention …

… now we all have to share the same towel in the same spray disinfectant, it makes no sense at all. And then another great surprise is that when it's time to take a shower there are no towels for showering and nobody seems to know why! …

showerReviews.reviewText: Our fourth year snow birding here, December - April. This is a place where you meet friends forever. Despite poor reviews from folks that are expecting silver platter service, this place is a gem. The wash rooms need upgraded but in four …

I enjoyed my time spent at Southern Comfort. The camp grounds were clean and so lush with beautiful plants and trees everywhere. I met so many awesome people here. The Tiki bar was alot of fun! Kristina the bartender takes care of you with great drinks, I spent my 33rd birthday here and I had a blast :] I hope to return in the future!

This park was fine.  I was scared after reading the other reviews but there's nothing to worry about.  We felt safe, it was clean and quiet.  The pool says it's for residents only, though.
A decent stop on the way to the keys.

showerReviews.reviewText: … Park is conveniently located on Sadler Road where it meets the ocean. Our favorite ocean access point. Always clean and it even has an outdoor shower. Nice to be able to wash some of the sand off before getting back inside your vehicle.

… that features live music. Walking, swimming, surfing, fishing, beach tailgaiting. The swim flag is usually, "yellow". Open 24/7, just can't park there from midnight to 5am. Bathrooms are open! Outdoor shower. Frequent dolphin sightings.

showerReviews.reviewText: The locker so dark, lights not working. Wall in the shower mods and gabages hairs all over in tge shower. Have used this club 3 times. Have not see any attendance in the lady room do cleaning like other LA fitness club.

… employees clearly do not use adequate cleaning and disinfectant products to make the bathrooms look or smell clean. in addition, They could use updated splash guards in the urinals and shower curtains with more privacy for the Ladies room. …

… have an issue using the equipment I need. Machines are rarely broken in my experience. Bathrooms could be cleaner, I don't think I'd shower there though. The main issue I have is the basketball courts. As a disabled vet I would love to come …

… would. Absolutely NASTY. The women's locker room was so unsanitary. I have never seen a more disgusting shower in my life. Unfortunately, I did not have my glasses on and didn't see until I was already in. There were hairs literally …

Some elliptical machines are in disrepair,  lockers are small with locks left on many and others broken.  Shower and restroom area is pretty gross and needs to be updated in a bad way. House music and ads are played too loud.. people have …

The hot tub has been down for a month with a big whole in the ceiling. The showers stalls need to be cleaned and the most of the shower heads are covered in lime crust. The management is seriously lacking. This place is falling apart and …

Not a well maintained gym at all. The treadmills are old squeaky and several of them have belt issues which can cause injuries. The shower area is filthy. I usually travel 5 miles further and go to the LA Fitness in Valrico
The Sauna has been down for a long time, and one of the shower heads in the men's showers has been missing for a long time. I can't believe it takes this long to get parts!
One of the better Esporta I go to. Except for the old man that is always singing in the shower.
